Our goal is to provide educational and research training opportunities to students and to foster the development of new interdisciplinary research collaborations between faculty at City University of New York (CUNY) City College of Technology and Weil Cornell Medicine of Cornell University (WCM)â€”in a shared mission to prepare the next generation of innovators and visionaries in the field of biomedical big data science.

Become a student researcher today!

Apply Today

Applications will open on November 1, 2017.

Internships start in Summer 2018.

For more information, contact us at bigdata@citytech.cuny.edu

What students can expect

  • Year-long paid training in Biomedical Big Data
  • Hands-on training sessions at City Tech
  • Summer bootcamp at Cornell
  • Internships at Cornell
  • Journal Club events
  • Annual student symposium on Biomedical Big Data at City Tech
